mapper.select: SELECT BUSERSEQ, BLISTSEQ, USERID, ENDDATE, STATUS, INDATE, "UPDATE", INUSERID, UPUSERID, NICKNAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, BUSERSEQ, BLISTSEQ, USERID, ENDDATE, STATUS, INDATE, "UPDATE", INUSERID, UPUSERID, NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT A.B_USER_SEQ AS BUSERSEQ, A.B_LIST_SEQ AS BLISTSEQ, A.USER_ID AS USERID, A.END_DATE AS ENDDATE, A.STATUS AS STATUS, A.IN_DATE AS INDATE, A.UP_DATE AS "UPDATE", A.IN_USER_ID AS INUSERID, A.UP_USER_ID AS UPUSERID, B.NICK_NAME AS NICKNAME FROM BLACK_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN BROWNIE_USER B ON (B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID) ORDER BY B_USER_SEQ ) ) WHERE ${contentPerPage} * (${currentPageNumber} - 1) < RN AND RN <= ${contentPerPage} * ${currentPageNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BLACK_USER(B_USER_SEQ, B_LIST_SEQ, USER_ID, END_DATE, STATUS, IN_DATE, UP_DATE, IN_USER_ID, UP_USER_ID) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(B_USER_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM BLACK_USER), #{bListSeq}, #{userId}, SYSDATE + #{endDate}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{id}, #{id})
mapper.update: UPDATE BLACK_USER SET STATUS = 'N', UP_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE B_USER_SEQ = #{bUserSeq}
